content: elli s crochet 2017 christmas gingerbread man christmas gingerbread man crochet pattern by elli ervine i have been crocheting for about 3 years i have enjoyed different crafts over the years and eventually stumbled over crochet when i found a kit in my local supermarket to make a winter beanie i have recently started to write my own patterns just because it seemed like the next step in my journey and for the sense of personal accomplishment it gave me i hope you love making this pattern as much as i have enjoyed creating it i can t wait to hear back from you positive feedback and also productive criticism are both welcome and will help me continue to learn i can t wait to see some of your creations please tag me on instagram @elliervine or share your projects via ravelry so i can enjoy your makes 1 www facebook com/elli crochet copyright elli s crochet 2017 christmas gingerbread man this pattern and the contents are property of elli ervine at elli s crochet and is for your personal use only you may not modify or sell this pattern however this is a free pattern and you may share it with others so long as it remains in its original state and in its entirety you are most welcome to sell your finished items but i would be most grateful if you would reference me when you sell them i really hope you enjoy baking up your gingerbread men and have a very merry christmas hope you check back in the new year for future patterns that i will add to my ravelry library https //www ravelry com/designers/elinor-ervine i am also planning a website where i hope to share more free patterns finished size dk size 24cm aran weight size 30cm gauge this is not important but to achieve the expected height use the recommended yarn and hook i suggest that if an alternative yarn is used the smallest size hook you feel comfortable using is selected this will often be a size or two down from the recommendations on the yarn packaging materials dk weight yarn  1x 50g dk paintbox cotton yarn in soft fudge  1x 50g dk paintbox cotton yarn in paper white not all this is used maybe 10g  3mm size 11 crochet hook  9mm safety eyes optional aran weight yarn  2x 50g aran paintbox cotton yarn in soft fudge  1x 50g aran paintbox cotton yarn in paper white not all this is used maybe 15g  4mm size 8 crochet hook  black 12mm safety eyes optional for both  red embroidery thread or up to dk weight yarn for mouth embroidery  toy stuffing  stich markers  buttons  any additional decorative items of your choosing 2 www facebook com/elli crochet copyright elli s crochet 2017
